description: Converts (packages) Python programs into stand-alone executables, under Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, AIX and Solaris.

info.Author:: Gordon McMillan, William Caban, Giovanni Bajo, Hartmut Goebel, Martin Zibricky
info.Keywords:: packaging, standalone executable, pyinstaller, macholib, freeze, py2exe, py2app, bbfreeze,
info.License:: GPL license with a special exception which allows to use PyInstaller to build and distribute non-free programs (including commercial ones).
info.Maintainer:: Giovanni Bajo, Hartmut Goebel, Martin Zibricky

longdescription: Converts (packages) Python programs into stand-alone executables, under Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, AIX and Solaris.
